structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Number of Persons in Local Unit Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of local unit size categories based on the number of persons employed, following European business statistics standards.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Up to 10 persons
structure:Code.common:Description: Local units with 1 to 10 persons employed, typically micro-enterprises.

structure:Code.common:Name: 11 to 19 persons
structure:Code.common:Description: Local units with 11 to 19 persons employed, typically small enterprises.

structure:Code.common:Name: 20 to 49 persons
structure:Code.common:Description: Local units with 20 to 49 persons employed, typically small to medium enterprises.

structure:Code.common:Name: 50 persons or more
structure:Code.common:Description: Local units with 50 or more persons employed, typically medium to large enterprises.

structure:Code.common:Name: Unknown but more than 10 persons
structure:Code.common:Description: Local units where the exact number of persons is unknown but confirmed to be more than 10.
